name: Leonardo Da VENI VEDI VICI Super Painter
name_original: Leonardo Da VENI VEDI VICI Super Painter
description:
Hi!

I was experimenting with this little project.

You can quickly create your own little wild life  world, like a little painting.

Have fun with it!

Controls:
Select Object and Left click/press to draw.
Mouse Scroll to zoom.
Hold mouse middle key pressed to move around.
Right click to stop current drawing/object editing.
